brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts 4B/5B code symbols using a table that converts 4-bit data patterns to 5-bit symbols. Data codes and control and invalid codes are shown.

Data Codes Table:
There are 16 4B values and corresponding 5B symbols in this table. Examples include:

4B Code: 0000
5B Symbol: 11110

4B Code:0001
5B Symbol:01001

4B Code: 1111
5B Symbol: 11101

Control and Invalid Codes Table:
There are 16 4B values and corresponding 5B symbols in this table. Examples include:
4B Code: idle
5B Symbol: 11111

4B Code: start of stream
5B Symbol: 11000

4B Code: invalid
5B Symbol: 1100
